mapper.insert: insert into project (pro_no, pro_comp, pro_id, pro_title, pro_content, pro_period, pro_budget, pro_personnel, pro_field, pro_ok) values(prono_seq.nextval, #{pro_comp}, #{pro_id}, #{pro_title}, #{pro_content}, #{pro_period}, #{pro_budget}, #{pro_personnel}, #{pro_field}, 0)
insert into projectimg(proimg_no, pro_no, us_id, changenamepro) values (proimgseq.nextval, prono_seq.currval, #{pro_id}, #{changenamepro} )
mapper.update: update project set pro_title=#{pro_title}, pro_content=#{pro_content}, pro_peride=#{pro_period}, pro_budget=#{pro_budget} , pro_personnel = #{pro_personnel}, pro_field = #{pro_field} where pro_no = #{pro_no}
mapper.select: select pro_no, pro_title, pro_budget, pro_period, pro_personnel from project where pro_ok = 1 order by pro_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into p_member (pro_no, us_id, prom_ok, re_no, us_name, re_title) values (#{pro_no}, #{us_id}, 0, #{re_no}, #{us_name}, #{re_title})
mapper.select: select count(*) from p_member where us_id=#{us_id} and pro_no=#{pro_no}
